About this product

Anew Skinvincible Deep Recovery Cream is here and ready to heal your damaged skin. Add it to your anti aging routine and see its restorative effects for yourself! Smart Repair Technology means this night cream was designed to the effects of aging by fixing damage accumulated throughout the years from the environment. This night cream is ideal for dry skin as it contains moisturizing properties and protects from further damage. Make fine lines, wrinkles, and sunspots disappear! Comes in a 1 oz container and is fragrance-free making it perfect for sensitive skin.

Benefits

  • Reduces the appearance of fine lines and sunspots
  • Smart Repair Technology fixes damaged skin and protects from further harm
  • Suitable for sensitive skin
  • Fragrance-free and oil-free
  • Hypoallergenic and non-comedogenic
  • Allergy-tested and dermatologist-tested

Ingredients

  • Water/eau
  • Hydrogenated polyisobutene
  • Stearyl dimethicone
  • Dimethicone

Reviews

Very happily surprised!

By Starlite77 on 8/1/2017

From: San Antonio, TX
Age: 35-44
I shop Avon: more than 6x a year
Skin Type: Combination

I have tried so many different creams and treatments over the years, from premium to budget, and they have either had no results or caused my sensitive skin to break out and react. After using a simple and gentle moisturiser for a while, I decided it was time to give another "treatment" style cream a go....I am so incredibly glad I did!

I have been using this product for about a month now and my skin loves it! Normally my skin lets me know very quickly if it reacts to a product...ususally within first few days...
